turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like to place a Starbucks pick up order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds good. What kind of starbucks for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I will have a venti caramel macchiato with soy milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. did you want whipped cream or any syrups?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay which starbucks did you want to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping to pick up at the Starbucks at the corner of 7th Avenue and Missouri.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. that's a venti iced caramel machiato from the starbucks on 7th avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready soon and you can expect a reciept via text.
